title: Topic 001 Question 224
body: A company updates its security policy to clarify cloud hosting arrangements for regulated workloads. Workloads that are identified as sensitive must run on hardware that is not shared with other customers or with other AWS accounts within the company.
Which solution will ensure compliance with this policy?
options: Deploy workloads only to Dedicated Hosts.
Deploy workloads only to Dedicated Instances.
Deploy workloads only to Reserved Instances.
Place all instances in a dedicated placement group.
